events.text: THIS PROJECT WOULD NOT BE POSSIBLE WITHOUT THE SUPPORT AND HELP FROM @ooysyrag                                                                                                                                               https://www.construct.net/en/forum/construct-3/general-discussion-7/pasting-drawing-canvas-split-143168

If you are to add more objects that you want to be on-screen, make sure to put them into families.                                                                                                                                                      Notice the extra blocks around the edges. You have to have those to keep the player in the middle of the screen or else the split-screen will not work right.                                                          Also notice the image point of the canvas is in the center, not in the top-left.
